title: Will u ever stop playing?

replies.body: I've tried to stop several times, and I've actually gone a while without video games a couple of weeks ago. I'm not sure when I'll permanently stop gaming though, but it's bound to happen in the next two years.
replies.body_tagged: I've tried to stop several times, and I've actually gone a while without video games a couple of weeks ago. I'm not sure when I'll permanently stop gaming though, but it's bound to happen in the next two years.

replies.body:
All good things must come to an end eventually.

When does "eventually" come?
Well, that's up to you.
replies.body_tagged:
All good things must come to an end eventually.

When does "eventually" come?
Well, that's up to you.

replies.body: Well being a fairly young age (13) i'm not exactly in a point in my life were i personally need to quit. Looking at the near future though i'll most likely quit when i'm 15-16 when i begin my GCSE's.

replies.body:
Mmmm, probably when...

1) I turn 18, and move out of the house, but that'll only be minecraft.
2) I get into a serious relationship with a girl, but I mean, if she's a gamer, don't mind me playing...
3) I die.

replies.body: The only video game I play is Minecraft. The only server I really play on is Avicus, so when Avicus dies, I will stop playing video games unless school gets really hard on me, but I doubt I'd have to quit because of school. I could manage myself. :P

replies.body: I go through phases, I've already had a 6 month break from Avicus since a joined a little a year ago. So, as long as new, better games keep coming out, Ill most likely not stop playing them in my free time. But what do i know, I'm 13.
